authorableFields.name: Title
authorableFields.description: Main heading text (e.g., 'Latest HKEX Insight, Research & Views')

authorableFields.name: Subtitle
authorableFields.description: Descriptive text below title (e.g., 'Explore unique analysis, considered opinions and thought provoking insight from across the HKEX business.')

authorableFields.name: Article Cards
authorableFields.description: Array of article objects containing image, title, date, category, and CTA buttons

authorableFields.name: Background Image
authorableFields.description: Background visual element with geometric shapes

authorableFields.name: View All Button
authorableFields.description: Show/hide 'View all' button at the bottom

components.uiDescription: A full-width carousel component featuring a large title, subtitle, and multiple article cards arranged horizontally. Each card contains an image, title, date, category tags, and call-to-action buttons. Includes navigation arrows and a 'View all' button at the bottom.
businessRequirements: Display latest HKEX insights and research articles in an engaging carousel format
Support multiple article types with consistent styling
Support content authoring for articles and metadata
components.reasoning: Requires custom development for carousel functionality, article card structure, and complex layout that cannot be fulfilled with standard AEM core components alone.
